main event: A UFO sighting was reported at Larson AFB, Washington, on 31/05/52 involving a cigar-shaped object observed for approximately 45 seconds.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately 70 feet long by 2 feet in diameter and flew at an altitude of about 2,000 feet., Witnesses noted the object changed color from white to orange and then red., The object emitted a bright light that was hard to look at., It was observed visually by 6 witnesses under clear weather conditions., The object was not tracked by radar and could not be positively identified.
